scripts.eval: cd apps/os && doppler run -- pnpm evalite
scripts.eval:light: cd apps/os && doppler run -- env -u BRAINTRUST_API_KEY pnpm evalite
scripts.db:studio:staging: PSCALE_DATABASE_URL=$(doppler secrets --config stg get --plain DRIZZLE_ADMIN_POSTGRES_CONNECTION_STRING) pnpm db:studio
scripts.db:studio:production: PSCALE_DATABASE_URL=$(doppler secrets --config prd get --plain DRIZZLE_ADMIN_POSTGRES_CONNECTION_STRING) pnpm db:studio
scripts.db:query: docker exec -it postgres-iterate psql -U postgres -d iterate
scripts.db:query:file: docker exec -i postgres-iterate psql -U postgres -d iterate -f
scripts.db:exec: docker exec -i postgres-iterate psql -U postgres -d iterate -c
scripts.postinstall:vibe-rules: vibe-rules install cursor && vibe-rules install codex && vibe-rules install claude-code
scripts.super-reset: pnpm i && pnpm docker:down && pnpm docker:clean && pnpm docker:up && sleep 3 && pnpm db:migrate
